entry.title: Meguiar's Headlight Restoration ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Headlight Restorer
Price: 34.99

Product description

Meguiar's Heavy Duty Headlight Restoration Kit is the easy way to obtain professional results restoring clarity to uncoated clear plastics with a standard corded drill. This inclusive kit comes with everything needed to safely and effectively remove heavy oxidation, cloudiness, and yellowing while delivering crystal clear results. Eliminate defects with included sanding discs and then polish up clarity with PlastX Clear Plastic Cleaner Polish and Easy-Buff Wool Pad attachment using a standard corded drill. Follow with Headlight Coating to preserve brilliant clarity and protect from re-oxidation for up to a year.


From the manufacturer

Car headlight cleaner provides professional results at home

If you have plastic headlights that aren’t looking as clear as they should, what do you do? Replacing the headlights can be pretty expensive and depending on the car they can be hard to find. It’s time to find yourself a good headlight kit!

Meguiar’s Heavy Duty Headlight Restoration Kit removes heavy oxidation, cloudiness and surface scratches, while delivering a crystal clear finish to restore headlights. It is ideal for severely oxidized, neglected or yellowed car headlights. This car headlight restoration kit utilizes both hand and drill application for sanding and machine buffing. To seal and protect the freshly restored lens, Meguiar’s proprietary Headlight Coating prevents re-oxidation for up to one year after application, keeping your car lights cleaner. The self-leveling coating contains 100% active ingredients, maximizing the durability and clarity of the headlight lens. This headlight cleaner and restorer from Meguiar’s makes it easy for anyone to achieve amazing results.



Kit Contents

This auto headlight restorer kit contains the following:

Meguiar’s PlastX Clear Plastic Cleaner & Polish (4 oz.)

 

  • Gently removes light oxidation, chemical degradation, surface contamination, stains and light surface scratches with ease. It features water resistant polymers that provide long-lasting durable protection. This cleaner and plastic polish contains a rich gel formula that quickly restores optical clarity to both rigid and flexible clear plastics.

 

Headlight Coating (4 oz.)

 

  • A proprietary spray coating that helps to improve and maintain optical clarity on freshly cleaned or restored headlights for up to a year. This unique formula provides durable UV protection and comes in an easy-to-use aerosol spray application. Meguiar’s Keep Clear Headlight Coating will give you the long-lasting clarity you're looking for.

 

 

  • Headlight Coating applicator pad
  • Easy-buff wool pad
  • 1000 and 3000 grit sanding discs
  • Easy grip hand sanding pad

 



How-To

Step 1

 

  • Start with a headlight cleaning. Remove dirt and dust with a glass cleaner and microfiber towel and mask around the headlight.

 

Step 2

 

  • Attach the 1000 grit disc to the hand pad, dunk the disc into water or spray water directly onto the disc, and repeat this periodically to ensure that the pad stays wet.

 

Step 3

 

  • Sand side to side until the headlight has a uniform frosted appearance and wipe dry with a microfiber towel. Repeat this process with the 3000 grit disc, but work up and down instead of side to side.

 

Step 4

 

  • Follow with PlastX Clear Plastic Cleaner & Polish and the included wool pad on a standard corded drill (between 1200 and 2500 RPMs) to polish the plastic back up to clarity. Work in thoroughly using moderate pressure for 1-2 minutes and wipe off with a microfiber towel. If needed, repeat this multiple times until the lens is clear.

 

Step 5

 

  • Spray with glass cleaner and wipe with a microfiber towel before applying the headlight coating for protection. Shake well and apply a medium coat of the headlight coating to the entire surface of the headlight, overlapping your passes by 50%. Allow to cure for 3-5 minutes and then apply a second coat for a thorough seal. The headlight coating will then be fully cured after 24 hours.

 



Meguiar’s is one of the worldwide leaders in car care. For more than 115 years, Meguiar’s has provided Car Crazy people with specialized, state-of-the-art formulations for making every car’s appearance show car perfect. Meguiar’s provides high performance car care products for every automotive surface, both on the interior and exterior of cars. The car care experts at Meguiar’s are dedicated to making sure customers get the premium results they are looking for. To learn more, visit our official website.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type:
Price: 18.19 - 83.49 (2 variants)

A non-abrasive formula that cleans, polishes and protects all fiberglass gel coat marine or RV surfaces in one easy step. Removes light oxidation and haze, minor scratches and swirls while providing long-lasting protection against salt air, corrosion and the sun’s ultraviolet rays. Available in liquid or paste.

entry.title: Meguiar's DA Microfibre Cutting Pads
entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 20.99

Meguiars DMC3 DA Microfiber Cutting Discs are part of the Meguiars DA Microfiber Correction System. Each specially engineered microfiber disc levels moderate paint imperfections without creating swirls! Meguiars guarantees it. Use these 3 inch cutting discs for spot correction.

  • Maximum efficiency
  • Engineered foam interface offers controlled conformability. As you move the polisher over the paint, the microfibers adapt to the curves and contours of the paint, distributing the abrasives evenly for efficient cutting
  • Comes in packs of 2

Not only will you love the results, you’ll love the process. Meguiars DA Microfiber Cutting Discs are made to work with Meguiars DA Microfiber Cutting Compound. This combination of products remove mild to moderate defects with minimal dusting, no slinging, and no swirls.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 16.99 - 20.99 (3 variants)

Meguiar's DA Microfibre Finishing Discs are part of the Meguiar's DA Microfibre Correction System. With soft microfibres and a flexible foam interface, Meguiar's DA Microfibre Finishing Discs refine paint to a brilliant shine.

  • Comes in 3 sizes
  • 3 inch finishing discs are perfect for spot detailing and coems in 2 per pack
  • 5 and 6 inch come as single pads
  • Optimized to deliver a high gloss with Meguiar's DA Microfibre Finishing Wax
  • New microfibre disc technology refines surface to a high gloss finish
  • Engineered foam interface for optimal cutting efficiency, and controlled conformability
  • Optimized for use with DA Microfibre Finishing Wax-D301

 

With maximum efficiency in mind, these pads engineered foam interface offers controlled conformability. As you move the polisher over the paint, the microfibres adapt to the curves and contours of the paint, distributing the wax and mild cleaners evenly for maximum protection and gloss.

Formulated using an advanced blend of polishing oils and micro-fine abrasives, Meguiar's DA 

Microfibre Polish provides complete paint refinement for a defect free finish. It's the perfect intermediate step between compound and wax. Use Meguiar's DA 

Microfibre Polish with a Meguiar's DA Microfibre Finishing Disc on your DA polisher.

After using Meguiar's DA Microfibre Correction Compound, Meguiar's DA Microfibre Polish further refines the surface, maximizing gloss, colour, and clarity.

entry.title: Meguiar's Wheel & Paint Iron Decon
entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 108.99

Meguiar’s D1801 Detailer Wheel & Paint Iron DECON is a unique pro-strength gel formula designed to safely & effectively remove embedded iron particles from body panels, wheels and painted brake components.
D1801 is also highly effective at removing road grime, grease and dirt from wheels and brakes, and is ready to use right out of the bottle. The rapid colour-changing properties help to indicate that it’s working to remove iron from wheels and paint. Despite being a highly effective pro-strength formula, it’s still pH balanced making it safe on all wheels and painted brake components. Meguiar’s D1801 Detailer Wheel & Paint Iron DECON is safe in a body shop environment.

  • PRO-STRENGTH: Highly effective pro-strength iron remover engineered for both wheels & paint

  • COLOUR CHANGING FORMULA: No compromise formula rapidly removes iron and changes colours

  • GENTLE: pH neutral formula is safe on all wheels & painted brake components

  • CLINGING ACTION: Gel formula clings to wheels to remove road grime, grease & iron

  • SAFE AND EFFECTIVE: Safely and effectively removes iron particles from body panels too

entry.title: Meguiar's Leather Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Interior Cleaning & Care
Price: 43.99

Meguiars D181 Leather Cleaner is a fast-acting cleaner for all leather interiors. Less aggressive than an APC, Meguiars D18101 Leather Cleaner is non-staining and colourless. It removes tough stains and restores a like-new look to leather upholstery. For production detailers or anyone looking for a good value, this is your leather cleaner.

  • formulated to tackle the stains that are too stubborn for a combo product.
  • Since it’s formulated for leather, you can depend on it cleaning safely but thoroughly
  • After cleaning, you can still use D180 Leather Cleaner & Conditioner to protect and condition the leather
  • great citrus fragrance
  • D181 Leather Cleaner has more cleaning power for Meguiars APC but it easier on leather surfaces

entry.title: Meguiar's Hyper Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Vehicle Washing & Glass Cleaning
Price: 45.99

One of the most satisfying experiences a car enthusiast can have is washing his or her vehicle. Watching that dirt just roll off the side panels amid thick white foam is one of the true joys of detailing. It’s a real shame when your suds quit before you’re finished washing. You probably find yourself using twice as much shampoo as the directions call for because you have to make more bubbles. Don’t bother! Instead, fill your wash bucket with an ounce of Meguiar’s D110 Hyper-Wash and 5 gallons of water. The suds will last and last!

  • super-concentrated shampoo that has the unbelievable dilution ration of 400:1
  • 640 ready-to-use gallons of wash water in this one gallon bottle!
  • foam lasts an extra long time, no need to pour in more concentrate

entry.title: Meguiar's Protein Stain Remover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Interior Cleaning & Care
Price: 38.99

Meguiars D116 Protein Stain Remover is a specially formulated cleaner that is designed to remove protein stains on carpet and upholstery. Meguiars D116 Protein Stain Remover also works exceptionally well on microfibre interiors. It will also dissolve urine stains and neutralize putrid urine odours. Meguiars D116 Protein Stain Remover is a concentrated formula that contains no added fragrance.

  • Fast protein based stain remover (milk, food, and organic matter)
  • Effective on microfiber interiors
  • Concentrated formula
  • Contains no added fragrance

If you’re a professional detailer, chances are you’ve encountered milk, food, or pet urine stains on carpet or upholstery. If you have, you know how difficult they can be to remove without damaging the delicate fibers of the carpet or cloth material. Meguiars knows this, which is why they’ve introduced a specially formulated cleaner for protein stains – Meguiars D116 Protein Stain Remover.

Meguiars D116 Protein Stain Remover is a concentrated formula. You can use this amazing cleaner full strength, or diluted up to 1:10 for spray application. Regardless of the dilution ratio you choose, rest assured Meguiars D116 Protein Stain Remover will not harm the material.

entry.title: Meguiar's Paint Reconditioning Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Meguiars
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 63.99

Meguiars Paint Reconditioning Cream D151 uses Meguiar’s cutting edge Unigrit abrasive and polymers to create a one-liquid solution that removes defects, produces incredible high shine with long lasting paint protection. One product does it all! Meguiars Paint Reconditioning Cream D151 is designed to provide fast and fantastic results in a high volume reconditioning facility, detail shop, or dealership.

  • aggressive enough to remove severe defects, yet gentle enough to produce a durable swirl free finish
  • fully adjustable polish. Change from a cutting pad to a light cutting pad, for example, to remove imperfections without holograms.
  • Use the Meguiars G110 Dual Action Polisher for light defect removal and a rotary buffer for heavier paint correction.
  • Apply by hand for ultra gentle swirl removal with absolutely no holograms.
